references.description: References of this entity in an other system. Reference is the exact same entity

version.description: Version of the entity. Version is to avoid updated an entity with an older version

active.description: Indicate if the entity is active, inactive entity won't appear in Discovery API

relatedEntityType.description: The type of the entity to apply the augmentation data.

relatedEntityId.description: Id of the entity to apply the augmentation data.

source.description: The source where the augementation data came from

versionNumber.description: Vesion of this augmentation data. This field is to avoid updating entity with old data.

score.description: The confidence (%) level of the accuracy of this augmention data. 100 is the better

changes.description: List of changes to apply to the related entity

AugmentationData.description: This class defines the Augmentation Data on the Publish API

op.description: Operation to apply on the entity.

from.description: Json path of the source entity when using the move operation.

path.description: Json path from the root of the document to the place where the change should be applied.

value.description: Data to change. MUST be a valid json object.

Change.description: This class defines the Changes on the Publish API

names.description: Names of the entity - multi-lingual fields

segment.description: A Segment is a primary genre for an entity (Music, Sports, Arts, etc)

genre.description: Secondary Genre to further describe an entity (Rock, Classical, Animation, etc)

subGenre.description: Tertiary Genre for additional detail when describring an entity (Alternative Rock, Ambient Pop, etc)

type.description: A Type represents a kind or group of people. (Donation, Group, Individual, Merchandise, Event Style, etc)

subType.description: Secondary Type to further categorize an entity (Band, Choir, Chorus, etc)

localTime.description: The event end time in local time

approximate.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the end date is approximated

versionNumber.description: Version of the entitlements. Version is to prevent to override an entitlements with an older one

data.description: The actual entitlements information to add to the entity
